name: Wait, Mr. Rabbit!
description:
Mr. Rabbit, as always is in a hurry. Help Alice catch up to him in the forest! Instructions

Press J for all bottom keys (red diamonds) and all F for all top keys (blue clubs) to allow Alice to chase after Mr. Rabbit and avoid all the hazards on the road!

Theme Relevance

We inspired ourselves from the following meaning that can be interpreted from the theme: “Veil”

  • Alice changes shape behind a magical poof animation, veiling her transformations.
Credits
  • Tuile - Game Designer, Artist
  • Yanapples - Programmer
Disclaimers
  • We made all the game art and coded most of the game ourselves. 
  • We got the Free 2d cartoon parallax background, on the asset store, which we modified for use.
  • Music assets are all royalty free. Krampus’s Workshop by Kevin MacLeod | Soundtrack for the game. All SFX from FreeSFX.com
